english: Baars and seager have refuted this interpretation .
chinese: 巴尔斯和西格驳斥了这种论点。

english: He was urgent to have it contradicted .
Isabel always felt an impulse to pull out the pins .
chinese: 伊莎贝尔总是忍耐不住，要把这些讽刺予以驳斥。

english: He knocked the bottom out of the rumours by explaining how matters stood .
chinese: 他说明了真实情况，驳斥了谣言。

english: I only want to think you perfect, and you set yourself against it .
chinese: 我要把你看作一个完美无暇的人，你就来驳斥。
驳斥造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The government had to fight off charges that its economic policy was in tatters .
chinese: 政府不得不对指责其经济政策一团糟的言论加以驳斥。

english: Much of this nonsense has already in previous chapters been exposed and refuted .
chinese: 这些荒谬的说法，多半已经在以上的各章中进行了揭露和驳斥。

english: So let us reject any among us who seeks to reopen wounds and to rekindle old hatreds .
chinese: 所以，我们应该驳斥我们之中企图使旧创复发，旧恨重燃的人。

english: After my brief rebuttal we got into a procedural wrangle about which issues remained to be settled .
chinese: 在我简单地驳斥了一下之后，我们开始了哪些问题尚有待解决的程序上的争论。

english: I was rebuffed and i spent a grim and tragic christmas eve in those most unchristian surroundings .
chinese: 我受到驳斥，在这种最没有基督教精神的环境中，我度过了一个十分惨淡的圣诞节前夜。

english: I made it a rule to forbear all direct contradiction to the sentiments of others, and all positive assertion of my own .
chinese: 我给自己规定，不得直接驳斥别人观点，不得断然肯定自己意见。

english: To the man of letters it is a missile that he can fling in the reader's face to disprove the pestilent heresy .
chinese: 对于文人，它是一颗导弹，他可以把它投到读者脸上，以驳斥那种有害的邪说。

english: To challenge the above explanation was the undoubted fact that he had never shown any impatience with the monotony of his life .
chinese: 一件不容置疑的事实却驳斥了上述的解释：他对自己过去那种单调的生活从来没有流露出什么厌烦不耐啊。

english: It ' s difficult to contradict someone politely
chinese: 彬彬有礼地驳斥别人是难以做到的。
目击者驳斥了早些时提出的证词。
